Content:
I would like to measure interest in getting a fiat off ramp for komodo via Blockcard which is a VISA debit card.  If you spend over 750 USD/ month it would be free to use in credit card type purchasing.  I use the card  (currently available in US, but adding 150 other nations in the next six months), and it has been without issues.  They currently accept 13 cryptos for deposit and convert it to Ternio while you wait to make your purchases.  I wanted to see if komodo could be the 14th option for funding the card.  Ternio BlockCardâ„¢ - The Cryptocurrency Debit Card

Author: NNoperator#3835
Content:
@CHMEX   ``PIN Transaction Fee (Intâ€™l) : $2.00
So each time I pay something there is a 2 usd fee for that?``  No  as long as you use it without PIN then you don't have fees.   If you decide to travel to another country and use it to get cash back from a grocery clerk and enter your PIN to do so , then there would be that fee.  Assuming that Blockcard works in that country, which is likely a false assumption at the moment.
